data.meta_description: You would like to celebrate your weeding in Lindau?üíí Whether a romantic hotel or a great locations. You will find what you are looking for ‚ù§Ô∏è
data.text:
You would like to spend the most beautiful day of your life at Lake Constance and get married in Lindau? We would be happy to support you with information! Are you looking for an unusual location for your marriage proposal at Lake Constance? A romantic hotel for the celebration with friends and families? Or a fascinating scenery for the photo shooting with bride and groom? Lindau offers the best conditions for an unforgettable wedding day.

Marriages with the probably most beautiful view of Lake Constance can be experienced in the wedding room of the registry office Lindau, which is located in the main building of the city administration, in Bregenzer Stra√üe 6. There is room for a total of 70 guests (20 seated, 50 standing).

For the subsequent champagne reception you can use the Toskanapark, which is located behind the building: From here you have a fantastic view of the directly bordering Lake Constance and the Alps. A marriage could hardly be celebrated more stylish and romantic!

The staff of the town of Lindau will be happy to help you find an appointment, consultation and organizational questions.

We would be happy to assist you in finding the perfect location for your wedding celebration: Lindau offers a wide range of suitable premises.

In the Pulverturm on the Western Island you can celebrate with up to 40 people directly on the shore of Lake Constance.

Are you planning a big wedding with many guests? Then the Inselhalle Lindau is a suitable venue for you. Of course many Lindau hotels and restaurants also offer suitable rooms for weddings.

We recommend you to book the desired location early in advance, as Lake Constance and Lindau are very popular for weddings.

Even if you would like to offer your wedding guests a supporting program, we are your well informed contact.

Whether it is a city tour, a boat trip or a wine tasting: With interesting, entertaining or unusual activities your guests will keep this special day in Lindau at Lake Constance in best memory.

If you would like advice or have specific questions, our colleagues at the tourist information office (group travel department) will be happy to help you.
